author: timbeiko
content: Small repo cleanup suggestion for `ethereum/pm`: creating a folder for each fork and using it to store things like readiness checklists, devnet specs, etc. Feedback welcome: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/913

author: timbeiko
content:
I also opened an EthMagicians thread to start discussing the next fork, as well as potential process changes. My #1 suggestion: going back to Meta EIPs for fork specs ðŸ™‚
